= Introduction =

This object represents a Familiar Hatchling Item.

This object is a subclass of [PerlKoLItemUsable KoL::Item::Usable]. Please see the documentation for more details on the functionality of this object.

==Methods==
===new(%args)===
This is the constructor of the object and should only ever be called by [PerlKoLItem#new(%args) KoL::Item->new()].

This object does not take any additional hash arguments beyond what [PerlKoLItemUsable#new(%args) KoL::Item::Usable->new()] uses.
